survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of cybersecurity awareness training programs within organizations, focusing on employee knowledge retention and behavioral changes.

questions.question_text: How often does your organization conduct mandatory cybersecurity training for employees?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice responses. Ensure mobile-friendly spacing.

script.question_text: How often does your organization conduct mandatory cybersecurity training for employees?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity topics were covered in your most recent training? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select responses. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity topics were covered in your most recent training? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how confident do you feel in identifying potential cybersecurity threats after completing the training? (1 = Not confident at all, 5 = Extremely confident)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with clear labels. Include a 'N/A' option if training was not completed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons with scale labels).

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how confident do you feel in identifying potential cybersecurity threats after completing the training? (1 = Not confident at all, 5 = Extremely confident)

questions.question_text: Describe one specific action you've taken to improve cybersecurity in your work as a result of the training.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field with a character limit of 500. Encourage specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text area with validation).

script.question_text: Describe one specific action you've taken to improve cybersecurity in your work as a result of the training.

questions.question_text: What additional cybersecurity training topics would you find most valuable for future sessions?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture unanticipated needs. Optional question.

script.question_text: What additional cybersecurity training topics would you find most valuable for future sessions?
